hero.h1: The Real Cost of Meeting Minutes: Are You Overpaying?
hero.tagline: Most productivity tools hide their true cost behind monthly fees you rarely utilize fully. Here is a transparent look at the cost of Minutes.AI compared to your time and other tools.
hero.subtag: Stop paying 'rent' for software. Pay only for the value you actually use.

intro.h2: The hidden cost of "Fixed Monthly Fees"
intro.p1: When searching for the cost of AI note-takers, you usually see a flat monthly rate (e.g., $30/month). But if you only have 3 meetings that month, your **actual cost per meeting** is $10. That's expensive.
intro.p2: We built Minutes.AI to fix this inefficiency with a model that respects your wallet.

breakdown.h2: Cost Breakdown: Time Packs vs. Subscriptions
breakdown.note: We offer two ways to pay, depending on your frequency. Here is the cost efficiency analysis for each.
breakdown.packTitle: Option A: The "Pay-As-You-Go" Approach (Best for ROI)
breakdown.packDesc: Ideal if your meeting schedule varies. You buy minutes that **never expire**. Zero wasted money.
breakdown.packMetric: Cost Efficiency: Approx $0.50 - $1.00 per hour of recording
breakdown.subTitle: Option B: The "Power User" Subscription
breakdown.subDesc: Ideal if you record daily. The more you record, the cheaper it gets.
breakdown.subMetric: Cost Efficiency: Unlimited usage for a fixed cap

roi.h2: ROI Comparison: AI vs. Human vs. Competitors
roi.lead: What does it actually cost to transcribe a 1-hour meeting? Let's look at the numbers.

rows.risk: High opportunity cost. You aren't doing your actual job.
Very expensive. Privacy concerns with sharing audio.
Sunk cost. You pay even if you have zero meetings.

value.h2: What am I actually paying for?
value.p1: The cost covers more than just speech-to-text. It covers the intelligence that structures your data.
items: **Security Costs:** We don't sell your data to offset costs. You pay us so we can keep your data private.
**High-End Models:** We use premium models (Whisper, GPT-4o, Gemini Pro) which have higher API costs but deliver readable accuracy.
**Cloud Storage:** Secure hosting for your audio and transcripts is included in the price.

items.q: Are there any hidden setup fees?
items.a: No. The price you see for the Time Pack or Subscription is the final price (excluding local VAT/taxes).

items.q: Why is the Time Pack considered 'lower risk'?
items.a: Because it eliminates the 'subscription fatigue'. If you don't use the app for 3 months, you lose $0. Your minutes wait for you.

items.q: Is the Free version actually free?
items.a: Yes. The 'Daily Ticket' gives you 3 minutes of recording/processing every day for $0 cost. It's great for quick voice memos.

items.q: How does the Annual cost compare to Monthly?
items.a: Paying annually ($149.99) lowers the effective monthly cost to about $12.50, compared to the $16.99 monthly plan. That's a ~26% saving.

cta.text: Ready to stop wasting money on empty subscriptions?
cta.sub: Start with a $1.99 trial pack. Lowest risk in the industry.
